title: Connection issue after lobby starts game?
body: Exactly what the title says and i can't start it up until everyone else is loaded and in the game and it very frustrating its going to cause me a few losses lol so what exactly can i do? it literally just black screen after lobby says connection issue retry again or whatever it says and i hit retry nothing until the game finally starts then i have to hit retry again and only then does it work.

replies.body: Actually, it's happening with a lot of summoners it seems, costing them then game and loss in Placements. Quite unfair.

Since this is constantly happening and not just a simple reconnect, I suspect your connection to the servers could be pretty *unstable*. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can ensure there aren't any conflicting network settings locally.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

If that were true, then you would assume that it wouldn't work on another device under the same network. My brother and I play together on separate laptops and it'll happen to me every other game while he is completely unaffected. He also hasn't updated to the new client so i believe it has something to do with that.. I've lost a handful of ranked matches because i was unable to reconnect after champ select. Sometimes it'll show up with a message saying retry or cancel and if i click cancel im able to click reconnect and get back into the game before my team remakes. Other times the message doesn't show and i'll reboot league or ill log off and back on, on my laptop and try to get back into the game before my team remakes... but then a handful of times already i wasnt able to reconnect until it was too late or unable to at all... I can log onto my brother's laptop and everything runs smoothly.
same thing is happening to me its so annoying
